pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides a library that adds ZRTP support to the GNU ccRTP stack and serves as library for other RTP stacks (PJSIP, GStreamer). Phil Zimmermann developed ZRTP to allow ad-hoc, easy to use key negotiation to setup Secure RTP (SRTP) sessions. The GNU ZRTP implementation is compliant to RFC 6189 and adds some more algorithms.
